projects.spatial.nodes

Class KDTreeNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • projects.spatial.nodes.KDTreeNode

  • public class KDTreeNode
extends java.lang.Object

    KDTreeNode is an abstraction over nodes of a KD-Tree. It will be used extensively by KDTree to implement its functionality.

    • Constructor Summary
